original_text: I will cause them to have many kinds of trouble. I will attack them like a soldier who shoots all his arrows. I will cause them to have many kinds of trouble. I will attack them like a soldier who shoots all his arrows. I will cause them to have many kinds of trouble.
korean_text: 내가 재앙을 그들 위에 쌓으며 내 화살이 다할 때까지 그들을 쏘리로다

sentences.original_text: I will cause them to have many kinds of trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 여러 종류의 재난을 일으키겠다.

sentences.original_text: like a soldier who shoots all his arrows.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 화살을 쏘는 군인처럼 할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will cause them to have many kinds of trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 여러 종류의 재난을 일으키겠다.

sentences.original_text: like a soldier who shoots all his arrows.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 화살을 쏘는 군인처럼 할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will cause them to have many kinds of trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 여러 종류의 재난을 일으키겠다.
